item.title: BTG
item.description: score:76 Chances: Mali’s industrial gold output is expected to drop by about 14% this year, which may impact B2Gold Corp’s operations in that region. Gold prices have surged recently and are trading at near all-time highs, which could positively impact B2Gold Corp’s profitability.
